Added_Other.mechanism: Updates the backend system for loading game data more efficiently.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppFixSearchTextBoxWidth
Added_Other.mechanism: Adjusts the width of the search text box in the Lua application.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances user experience by making the search text box easier to use.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppRecommendedGamesCollectionCarousel
Added_Other.mechanism: Enables a carousel display for recommended games in the Lua app.
Added_Other.purpose: Players can easily browse and discover recommended games in a visually appealing way.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppShowAgeRatingWithPlayButtonOnTileHoverWithHiddenMetadata
Added_Other.mechanism: Displays age ratings when hovering over game tiles in the app.
Added_Other.purpose: Helps players quickly see if a game is appropriate for them.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppSupportEmptyStringFooterMetadata
Added_Other.mechanism: Enables support for metadata in Lua apps, even when the footer is an empty string.
Added_Other.purpose: Ensures that apps can still function properly without requiring footer content, improving flexibility.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuauOccursCheckInCommit
Added_Other.mechanism: Enables checks during code commits to catch errors in Luau scripts.
Added_Other.purpose: Helps developers avoid mistakes, leading to more stable games.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuauRefineDistributesOverUnions
Added_Other.mechanism: Refines how the Luau programming language handles unions.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves coding accuracy and efficiency for developers.

Added_Other.name: FFlagMigrateEmptyResultsViewToFoundation
Added_Other.mechanism: Updates the way empty search results are displayed using a new framework.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves the appearance and usability of search results when no items are found.

Added_Other.name: FFlagOnlyVisibleFramesAllowModal
Added_Other.mechanism: Restricts modal dialogs to only show on visible frames.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves user experience by preventing pop-ups from appearing in hidden areas.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPassTextAlignmentRelevancyInfo_Staged

Added_Other.purpose: Improves the display of text on passes, making it more readable and visually appealing.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPerfDataOnTelemetryV2
Added_Other.mechanism: Collects performance data to improve system monitoring.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPerformanceTelemetryHandleSpuriousWake
Added_Other.mechanism: Improves how the system handles unexpected wake events.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances overall game performance by reducing interruptions during gameplay.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPlaceVersionHistoryMetadataRCC_Staged

Added_Other.name: FFlagProfilePlatformEnableChipSocialRow_v6_IXP

Added_Other.name: FFlagReCacheIconsOnThemeChange
Added_Other.mechanism: Refreshes icon caches when the game's theme changes.
Added_Other.purpose: Ensures players see updated icons that match the current theme.

Added_Other.name: FFlagRefactorIsTopBarFocused
Added_Other.mechanism: Revises how focus is managed on the top bar of the user interface.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves navigation and usability for players interacting with the top bar.

Added_Other.name: FFlagRemoveLeaveShortcutFromLeaveConfirm
Added_Other.mechanism: Removes the keyboard shortcut for leaving a game from the confirmation dialog.
Added_Other.purpose: Prevents accidental game exits, ensuring players stay in their games longer.

Added_Other.name: FFlagRemoveRespawnShortcutFromRespawnConfirmation
Added_Other.mechanism: Disables the shortcut for respawning during the confirmation phase.
Added_Other.purpose: Ensures players make a deliberate choice before respawning, reducing accidental respawns.

Added_Other.name: FFlagReverbAbsorptionField
